messages.title: We Need This Election Now
messages.content: We need this election now to secure the strong and stable leadership that the United Kingdom needs to see us through Brexit and beyond; to lock in the economic progress we have made together.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing leadership to handle Brexit and economic progress.
Lock in the economic progress made.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour, Lib Dem and SNP opponents are already seeking to disrupt our Brexit negotiations.

issues.brexitEurope: Our Labour, Lib Dem and SNP opponents are already seeking to disrupt our Brexit negotiations. This is in addition to the 27 European countries lining up to oppose us.
issues.economy: Their position can only mean one thing - uncertainty for the British people; bringing grave risk to our growing economy with higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.

examples: We need this election now to secure the strong and stable leadership that the United Kingdom needs to see us through Brexit and beyond; to lock in the economic progress we have made together.
Our Labour, Lib Dem and SNP opponents are already seeking to disrupt our Brexit negotiations.
Their position can only mean one thing – uncertainty for the British people; bringing grave risk to our growing economy with higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.
We need this election now to secure the strong and stable leadership that the United Kingdom needs to see us through Brexit and beyond; to lock in the economic progress we have made together.
Our Labour, Lib Dem and SNP opponents are already seeking to disrupt our Brexit negotiations.
Their position can only mean one thing – uncertainty for the British people; bringing grave risk to our growing economy with higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.
